source:
def average_adjacent(data):
  if len(data) == 0:
    return []
  if len(data) == 1:
    return [data[0]["x"]]
  data.sort(key=lambda v: v["time"])
  previous, current = None, data[0]["x"]
  time = data[0]["time"]
  result = []
  for value in data[1:]:
    previous = current; current = value["x"]
    result.append({"time": time, "x": (previous + current)/2})
    time = value["time"]
  return result
